ygData.subject: Guise of the Deciever!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: WOOHOO!!! I finally got it! it took me about 2 weeks of constant camping, but it was worth it! As soon as i got into the Assasin group he spawned and, and had
ygData.messageBody:
WOOHOO!!! I finally got it! it took me about 2
weeks of constant camping, but it was worth it! As soon
as i got into the Assasin group he spawned and, and
had the mask. Since i was the only one not to have it
already in the group...I got it! The Stats on the mask
are Cha +14 magic +7, only bard/rogue can wear. BUT
when you right click on the mask it turns you into a
dark elf! Well im very happy. Just had to let you guys
know<br><br>Kaylin 36th Brad, (somtimes dark elf) Minstrel of
Norrath on the Mithaniel Marr server<br><br>ps sorry, i
didnt get the message about the raid untill too late =(
